name: Goober Goes Ballistic
description:
Goober is on the warpath to defeat his nemesis, bathroom sign guy. Luckily goober has the power to go back in time so he can find the best route to beat him.

Break red blocks to slow down your nemesis. Sometimes you are slower in some levels sometimes he is faster, so plan your route accordingly.

Controls:

A D - Move

Space - Jump

Shift - Run

Esc - Quit

R - Restart Level
